overview: Booking website for IMPERIALcut with customer booking flow and admin dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can complete a booking end-to-end and receive an email confirmation.
Admin can view new bookings in the dashboard and mark them as read/confirmed.
Booking system enforces service durations and barber availability to avoid conflicts.
The site is responsive and accessible by WCAG 2.1 AA-level basics.
key_features: Booking Flow UI: multi-step booking with service/barber selection and live availability.
Admin pages: appointments, availability, barbers, services, messages, dashboard.
Persistence via Supabase and confirmation emails via Supabase Edge Function.
